ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides two convenience functions assert() and test_pkg() to facilitate testing R packages.
Provides two convenience functions assert() and test_pkg() to facilitate testing R packages.

name: r-testit
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.15" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-testit
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/testit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/testit/testit_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f886cd958a124fde24cab5986ef771cda1644e57bd8e17994d8adb72b2f04207

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('testit')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('testit')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/yihui/testit
  license: GPL
  summary: Provides two convenience functions assert() and test_pkg() to facilitate testing R packages.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - croth1

# Package: testit
# Type: Package
# Title: A Simple Package for Testing R Packages
# Version: 0.9
# Authors@R: c( person("Yihui", "Xie", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "xie@yihui.name", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-0645-5666")),  person("Steven", "Mortimer", role = "ctb", email="reportmort@gmail.com") )
# Description: Provides two convenience functions assert() and test_pkg() to facilitate testing R packages.
# License: GPL
# URL: https://github.com/yihui/testit
# BugReports: https://github.com/yihui/testit/issues
# Suggests: rstudioapi
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-12-05 17:42:23 UTC; yihui
# Author: Yihui Xie [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0645-5666>), Steven Mortimer [ctb]
